Oh my Gob! You're one of those adventurerurers, aren't ya?You got nothin' on me, �[man./lady.] I was just mindin' my own businesesess, lookin' for junk an' stuff.1�
Hey, watch out. You don't wanna fight me. I'll turn you into meat jerky!Wait, how about you and me be friends instead? Sound good?1�
I travel all over the world and hear lots of differererent stories. I even hear your stories. I can tell you one, if you want.1�
Do you want to hear a story?No, thank you.Let's hear one.1�
Do you want to hear a story?No, thank you.Sinister Reign.1�
Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.1�
Well now, you wouldn't think to find a mortal all the way down here. Did you lose your way, little �[boy/girl]?1�
I jest, of course. Ahah. Ahaaah.1�
I'm waiting for my friends to come. Soon the show will begin...but you, you're not ready yet. So leave me be.1�
Well, well. If it isn't you.1�
The curtain's fallen. The house is empty. Yet here you are, after all our revels ended. Hehehe, you really are something, aren't you?1�
Now why would a puny mortal like me be sitting all the way down here, you wonder? <Sigh> Oh, what's the point? I've grown tired of masquerades.1�
It's me, you know.1�
What do you say?Sorry, who?It can't be...Balamor?1�
...Wha-?After all we've been through together... <Sigh>1�
That's right. Say my name... Say it!1�
Yessssss! Of course! The one and only, yours truly!��1�
Surprised? <Chuckle>1�
Relax. I'm not going to steal your princess or get in the way of whatever adventure you're on. I don't even care anymore.1�
No one's forcing you to believe me, of course...it's your call.1�
I mean really, if I wanted to finish you, don't you think I would have picked a better entrance?1�
No, I'm down here because it's over. All over.The orchestra's all gone home, the set is struck. Adoulin's princess is as snug and safe as a clam.1�
Peace stands supreme. Peace, that dim paralysis, lazy, insensible, mull'd, deaf...1�
Peace is dull.1�
Let me have strife! A man's life should be a struggle, a dashing spectacle from the cradle to the grave.1�
Now I'm not a man, nor am I alive, but I still know that nothing is more dreary than the changeless day-to-day of middling minds.1�
Even you can't deny that, can you?1�
What do you say?Sometimes we all need a little chaos....1�
Bwehehehe, yessssss! I knew that I liked you for a reason!1�
Hehehehe... Yes, your silence speaks volumes. You of all people can't deny the chaotic flame that burns in your heart of hearts.1�
You don't have to hide it, you know. We're all friends down here.1�
It makes no difference. As cruel fate would have it, I, Balamor the Deathborne Xol, am bored.1�
It's enough to make me want to smash this boring little world into boring itty-bitty bits.1�
Mehehehe, then again, at the rate things are going these days, I might not even have to get up from my seat. If you want my advice, just sit back and enjoy the show.1�
Oh, right. My apologies. Of course, you intend to save the world, right? No doubt you're already running about doing...whatever it is you do.1�
But enough about you, here is my grand proposition.1�
Consider this your formal invitation to my little game, Sinister Reign! The perfect occasion to let off any steam built up from the dangerous excesses of passivity and torpor.1�
Take this 3����, your ticket for the evening. Ahhh... But I need something from you first. What is it you call it, that thing you mortals value so much? Yes, bayld. I want some of your bayld.1�

You see, in my spare time I've started a collection. I figure if I can't have my apocalypse now, I might as well find something pretty to sit on in the meantime. And after all, I will be your host for the evening. It's only fitting, is it not?1�

As your honored host (and audience!) for the evening, I've got some truly delightful cards lined up for you tonight! Ladies and gentlemen, boys and girls! There's no telling what might come through the gate when the curtains rise!1�
I won't stand any longer between you and your prize! I can already hear the war drum in your heart! The fires of conquest burn bright in your eyes. 1�
...In that, my friend, you and I are not so far apart.1�
Onwards then! Let our Sinister Reign begin!1�
You have questions, needs...desires? Speak, my little mortal friend.1�
What do you say?Actually, I'm fine, thank you.I'll bite, give me a moth.What did I win?What is ��Sinister Reign��?Why the disguise?1�
Hmph. I don't believe you. Come back when you've grown bored of that little life of yours.1�

Oooh! A new champion enters the ring! But first, your bayld! Give me, maybe...
	 bayld? Bwehehehe!1�

Pay bayld? (current bayld: 
	)Why not?No way.1�
Ahhh...pleasure doing business with you, �[Mr./Ms.]  ! Here it is, just hold it up to the waypoint over there and let it join in with its little friends, mwehehehe.1�
And, of course, have a pleasant battle!��1�
Oh dear. I'm terribly sorry, �[Mr./Ms.]  , but I'm afraid I can only provide one moth per customer, bwehehe...not that you'll need more than one... Come back if you lose it, Sweetiepoo.1�
Now, now, what's this? Trying to pull one over on the old Balamor? I'm so veeery disappointed in you. Come back when you can pay my fee.1�
And don't think that I still can't crush you like a worm...1�
What's this? Changed our minds, have we?1�

Quite a show you put on for us back there, quite...a...show! Oh, that's right, you were probably expecting some kind of ��reward�� weren't you? Didn't anybody teach you that murder is its own reward? Mwehehehe.1�
Oh, please. Stop being so serious all the time. Here, pick a prize. My little thank-you gift for a most...entertaining display...1�

Why of course, so many difficult choices! These aren't trinkets you can find just anywhere, after all. Having hand-picked these toys from my personal collection, I find your befuddled confusion...most satisfying!1�
Come back whenever you've made up your little mind.��1�
Oooh, what an excellent choice!Are you sure?1�
Choose the #����?Of course I'm sure.Hold on.1�
Oh, of course ��of course you're sure!�� How wicked of me to doubt your noble grace. Here you are. Take good care of it now.1�
Ohohoho, you mortals are fickle, aren't you? Don't worry, you can take all...the...time...in...the...world!��1�
Oooh, what an excellent choice!Are you sure?1�
Choose the #����?Of course I'm sure.Hold on.1�
Oh, of course ��of course you're sure!�� How wicked of me to doubt your noble grace. Here you are. Take good care of it now.1�
Ohohoho, you mortals are fickle, aren't you? Don't worry, you can take all...the...time...in...the...world!��1�
Oooh, what an excellent choice!Are you sure?1�
Choose the #����?Of course I'm sure.Hold on.1�
Oh, of course ��of course you're sure!�� How wicked of me to doubt your noble grace. Here you are. Take good care of it now.1�
Ohohoho, you mortals are fickle, aren't you? Don't worry, you can take all...the...time...in...the...world!��1�
Oooh, what an excellent choice!Are you sure?1�
Choose the #����?Of course I'm sure.Hold on.1�
Oh, of course ��of course you're sure!�� How wicked of me to doubt your noble grace. Here you are. Take good care of it now.1�
Ohohoho, you mortals are fickle, aren't you? Don't worry, you can take all...the...time...in...the...world!��1�
You want my...bayld? You do realize the true value of this powder, don't you? Well, far be it from me to get between a �[man/woman] and �[his/her] pleasure.1�

Receive 
  bayld?Yes!On second thought, maybe not.1�
Oh, of course ��of course you're sure!�� How wicked of me to doubt your noble grace. Here you are. Take good care of it now.1�
Ohohoho, you mortals are fickle, aren't you? Don't worry, you can take all...the...time...in...the...world!��1�
It's simple, really. A three-round tournament, winner takes all. Oh, and don't be alarmed if you see a few familiar faces in the ring. Let's just say I've packed a few...surprises for you.1�

And there are no tricks or illusions in this show. Everything you see is grade A, one hundred percent real. Well, a slightly...improved reality, wouldn't you say? Sculpting space and time is my specialty, after all.1�
All the performers are under glorious Balamor's protection, so go ahead and hit them as hard as you like, mwehehehe...1�
Can't have your puppets dying on you in the middle of the show, now can we? Where's the fun in that?1�
And don't even bother trying to communicate with them. They are as bound to my will as moths around a flame.1�
Just look, bwehehehe...1�
Oh, and did I mention that you can also fight a single round against an opponent of your choice if that is your desire?1�

And since my generosity knows no bounds, I've even prepared a separate set of rewards for these single-round challenges. Will you emerge victorious and lay claim to them...? Well, that is up to you.1�
Oh, almost forgot. That moth will only let you play once.1�
If you want another taste, just come back and see me again. You can fight as many times as you like, as long as you bring me more of that shiny, glittery powder, of course...1�
That's all there is to it, pup. So tell me, what's your heart's desire?1�
What, this old thing? Well, there's a time and place for every outfit, don't you know? Can't go scaring away all the neighborhood now.1�
Personally, I prefer a more...extravagant regalia, but then again, what makes you think you're not talking to Malobra, the Elvaan warrior?1�
Maybe I'm here, and then again, maybe I'm not. Who knows where the true Balamor resides?1�
